entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, 1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 7:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: 1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 57 %
Dewpoint: -6.1°C
Wind: SW 32 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers late in the morning and early afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023
